law.catch_line: Recall of vehicle -- Duty of manufacturer or distributor.
law.text: In the event a manufacturer or distributor recalls any of its products, the manufacturer or distributor must include within the written notice thereof to vehicle owners and dealers the expected date by which necessary parts and equipment will be available for the correction of the defects necessitating the recall.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.
